channel.title: Music – Dokken
channel.description: Recent content in Dokken on Music

item.title: Dokken - Kiss Of Death
item.description:
작사: Jeff Pilson, George Lynch, Don Dokken
KY: 60562 / KY: 20974

A brief
encounter like
Wind through
the trees
It came so suddenly
But then it was gone
Like it had
never been
How could I have
ever seen
A lost heart
Will take your soul
How could
I have known
How could
I have known
As she took me
in her arms
And brought me
to an end
With the
kiss of death
The kiss of death
She promised paradise
As she lied
upon her bed
Like a
fallen angel
With the
devil’s charm
She promised
paradise
With the
kiss of death
I tried to stop
As she held
Out her hand
But the fire was
Burning inside She
knew what I wanted
She gave it and more
But now I must
Pay the price
We were strangers
Passing
in the night
How could
I have known
How could
I have known
As she took me
in her arms
And brought me
to an end
With the
kiss of death
The kiss of death
She promised paradise
As she lied
upon her bed
Like a
fallen angel
With the
devil’s charm
She promised
paradise
With the
kiss of death

As she took me
in her arms
I felt the
devil’s charm
Suddenly I see
The final destiny
With the
kiss of death
The kiss of death
She promised paradise
As she lied
upon her bed
Like a
fallen angel
With the
devil’s charm
She promised
paradise
With the
kiss of death

With the
kiss of death
With the
kiss of death
With the
kiss of death
With the
kiss of death
With the
kiss of death
Kiss kiss
kiss kiss
With the
kiss of death
The kiss
of death
With the
kiss of death
With the
kiss of death
With the
kiss of death
With the
kiss of death
With the
kiss of death

item.title: Dokken - Alone Again
item.description:
작사: Jeff Pilson, Don Dokken
KY: 62076 / KY: 7923

I’d like to see you
in the morning light
I like to feel you
when it comes to night
Now I’m here
and I’m all alone
Still I know how it
feels I’m alone again
Tired so hard
to make you see
But I couldn’t
find the words
Now the tears
they fall like rain
I’m alone again
without you
Alone again
without you
Alone again
without you

I said stay but
you turned away
Tried to say
that it was me
Now I’m here and
I’ve lost my way
Now I know
how it feels
I’m alone
again
Tried so hard to
make you see
But I couldn’t
find the words
Now the tears they
fall like rain
I’m alone again
without you
Alone again
without you
Alone again
without you
Alone again
without you

I tried so hard to
make you see
But I couldn’t
find the words
Now the tears they
fall like rain
I’m alone again
without you
Alone again
without you
Alone again
alone again
Alone again
without you
